Translations.Text: eoneu mueosdo hananim-i gyesi ham-eul banghaehaji moshaessnola yes sedae ga geugeos-eul geobuhaess-euni hananim-i samudeuege amnagtalosseo yesihayeoss eul ttae geudeul-i geugeos-eul ulonghaessdeola hananim-i yejung-eul naelim-eun dulyeoum-eulgajdolog ham-ila

hananim-i geudaeege malhanonijunimkkeseo ingandeul-eul ewossago iss-eumyeo hananim-i geudaeege boyeojun geos eun baegseongdeul-eul siheomhagi wihaeseola ttohan kkulan-e issneun jeojubad-eun namu do geuleohageoneul hananim-i geudeul-eul dulyeobge hayeoss-euna geudeul-ui ma-eum-eun omanham-eul deohal ppun-ideola

hananim-i cheonsadeul-ege illeo adam-ege buboghala hani geudeul mo duga buboghayeoss-eudoe ibeulliseuneun geuleohji anihago heulg-eulobuteo changjohan-ingan-ege buboghalan mal-iyo lago hamyeonseo geoyeoghaessdeola

geuga tto malhadeola igeos-i dangsinkkeseo nae wie eunhyeleul deohan jainyo dangsinkkeseo naleul simpan-ui nalkka ji yuyehandamyeon naneun geuui husondeul eul sosuman je-oehagoneun myeolmangke ha liyo
ittae junimkkeseo ileusini ga la geudeul jung-e neoleul ttaleuneun ja iss damyeon sillo jiog-i neohuileul wihan neomchineun bosang-i doelila

tto ileusigil nega hal su iss neun neoui yuhog-ui mogsolilo geudeul-eul myeolmang-eulo yuinhae bola neoui jason deul-eul buyuke hagessnola yagsoghae bo la satan-eun geudeul-ege yagsog-eul ihaeng chi moshago gimanhadeola
sillo neoneun naui jongdeul wie amuleon gwonneung-i eobsnani junim-ui bo hohasim-eulo chungbunhanila
neohui junim-i neohuileul wihae baelohayeo badaleul hanghaehage hani ilohayeo neohuiga geubun-ui eunhyeleul guhadolog ham-ila sillo geubun-eun neo huiege jabileul bepusyeossnola
